name: SalHyperTalkOther
_source: speak;Sal;A myrmidon? Do you fight for Monsdor?
speak;Hyper;I was too weak to save my leader from these dogs.|Monsdor will pay with blood!|I will fight alongside you, for Pykroe's honour!
speak;Sal;Monsdor are strong, your help is appreciated.|What's your name?
speak;Sal;My condolences Hyper.|General Sal of Arcei.|I won't let you suffer any more.
